preferences.name: 2FAuth URL
preferences.description: The URL for your 2FAuth Instance (ex https://2fauth.domain.com)

preferences.name: Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Create a PAT from your 2FAuth account settings (under OAuth)

preferences.name: Cache Refresh Frequency (hours)
preferences.description: Set how often the account cache should be automatically refreshed.  The cache can be manually refreshed using the sync action.

preferences.name: Display Recent Accounts
preferences.description: Set the maxiumum number of recent accounts to display.
